title: Forget Vivian - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Sickly Characters
author: rainbow cake   무지개케이크
description:
“We’re getting a divorce, Samuel.”

It was a matter of arrangement, but we got married I loved him and I dreamed about a future with him

But Samuel tells Vivian that she shouldn’t do anything.​

” Even if you have child, I won’t admit it. So clear your mind.”

Even if I have a child.

​The three years of marriage gave Vivian more despair than hope.

​But Vivian is pregnant.

Vivian erases her memories and decides to leave.

​“ Forget me.”​

And the next day, Vivian .

The silver disappeared without leaving a trace.​

Vivian, who had disappeared back, on the brink of death.​

Please, can you stay alive?>
